original_text: “‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: On the day it was brought down to the realm of the dead I covered the deep springs with mourning for it; I held back its streams, and its abundant waters were restrained. Because of it I clothed Lebanon with gloom, and all the trees of the field withered away.
korean_text: 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 그가 스올에 내려가던 날에 내가 그를 위하여 슬프게 울게 하며 깊은 바다를 덮으며 모든 강을 쉬게 하며 큰 물을 그치게 하고 레바논이 그를 위하여 슬프게 울게 하며 들의 모든 나무를 그로 말미암아 쇠잔하게 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Sovereign Lord says:
On the day it was brought down to the realm of the dead
I covered the deep springs with mourning for it;
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그것을 위해 깊은 샘들을 애통으로 덮었고;

sentences.original_text: and its abundant waters were restrained.
Because of it I clothed Lebanon with gloom,
sentences.korean_translation: 그것 때문에 나는 레바논을 어둠으로 입혔으며,

sentences.original_text: and all the trees of the field withered away.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 들의 모든 나무들이 마르고 말았습니다.
